abstract: Intel will add a third leg to its big event media strategy with a major presence during the CBS coverage of March Madness, a k a the Division I men’s basketball tournament of the National Collegiate Athletic Association.
snippet: Intel will add a third leg to its big event media strategy with a major presence during the CBS coverage of March Madness, a k a the Division I men’s basketball tournament of the National Collegiate Athletic Association.
lead_paragraph: One of the most notable trends on Madison Avenue so far this year is the embrace of so-called big event television by advertisers, which are seeking to run commercials during the live coverage of major programs like the Grammys, the Super Bowl, the Winter Olympics and the Academy Awards.

headline.main: Intel Goes ‘Mad’ as Big-Event TV Strategy Continues

abstract: Betaworks, the start-up incubator that helped spawn TweetDeck and Bit.ly, raises $20 million.
snippet: Betaworks, the start-up incubator that helped spawn TweetDeck and Bit.ly, raises $20 million.
lead_paragraph: As I recently reported, there are many indications that the start-up culture in New York has flickered back to life.

headline.main: Investors Bet on Betaworks, a New York Tech Incubator
